title: Rewriting in Artin groups without A_3 or B_3 subdiagrams
authors:
Rub\'en Blasco-Garc\'ia, Mar\'ia Cumplido, Derek F. Holt, Rose
  Morris-Wright and Sarah Rees
abstract:
We prove that the word problem in an Artin group G based on a diagram without
A_3 or B_3 subdiagrams can be solved using a system of length preserving
rewrite rules which, together with free reduction, can be used to reduce any
word over the standard generators of G to a geodesic word in G in quadratic
time. This result builds on work of Holt and Rees, and of Blasco-Garc\'ia,
Cumplido and Morris-Wright. Those articles prove the same result for all Artin
groups that are either sufficiently large or 3-free, respectively.
